005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008/**
009 * MPTY: Exceptions related to Metapath type errors.
010 */
011public class TypeMetapathException
012    extends AbstractCodedMetapathException {
013  /**
014   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPTY0004">err:MPTY0004</a>: It
015   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-type-error">type error</a>
016   * if during the
017   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-analysis">static analysis
018   * phase</a>, an expression is found to have a
019   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-type">static type</a> that
020   * is not appropriate for the context in which the expression occurs, or during
021   * the <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-dynamic-evaluation">dynamic
022   * evaluation phase</a>, the
023   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-dynamic-type">dynamic type</a> of
024   * a value does not match a required type as specified by the matching rules in
025   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-sequencetype-matching">2.5.5
026   * SequenceType Matching</a>.
027   */
028  public static final int INVALID_TYPE_ERROR = 4;
029  /**
030   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPTY0019">err:MPTY0019</a>: It
031   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-type-error">type error</a>
032   * if {@code E1} in a path expression {@code E1/E2} does not evaluate to a
033   * sequence of nodes.
034   */
035  public static final int BASE_PATH_NOT_A_SEQUENCE = 19;
036  /**
037   * The context item is not a node when evaluating an axis step.
038   */
039  public static final int NOT_A_NODE_ITEM_FOR_STEP = 20;
040
041  /**
042   * the serial version UID.
043   */
044  private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
045
046  /**
047   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
048   * and {@code cause}.
049   *
050   * @param code
051   *          the error code value
052   * @param message
053   *          the exception message
054   * @param cause
055   *          the original exception cause
056   */
057  public TypeMetapathException(int code, String message, Throwable cause) {
058    super(code, message, cause);
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
063   * and no cause.
064   *
065   * @param code
066   *          the error code value
067   * @param message
068   *          the exception message
069   */
070  public TypeMetapathException(int code, String message) {
071    super(code, message);
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, no message, and
076   * the {@code cause}.
077   *
078   * @param code
079   *          the error code value
080   * @param cause
081   *          the original exception cause
082   */
083  public TypeMetapathException(int code, Throwable cause) {
084    super(code, cause);
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public String getCodePrefix() {
089    return "MPTY";
090  }
091}
